Package aima.core.environment.wumpusworld

Class WumpusKnowledgeBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • aima.core.logic.propositional.kb.KnowledgeBase
      • aima.core.environment.wumpusworld.WumpusKnowledgeBase
  • public class WumpusKnowledgeBase
extends KnowledgeBase
    A Knowledge base tailored to the Wumpus World environment.
    Author:
    Ciaran O'Reilly, Federico Baron, Alessandro Daniele

    • Constructor Detail

      • WumpusKnowledgeBase

        public WumpusKnowledgeBase​(int caveXandYDimensions)

      • WumpusKnowledgeBase

        public WumpusKnowledgeBase​(DPLL dpll,
                           int caveXandYDimensions)
        Create a Knowledge Base that contains the atemporal "wumpus physics" and temporal rules with time zero.
        Parameters:
        dpll - the dpll implementation to use for answering 'ask' queries.
        caveXandYDimensions - x and y dimensions of the wumpus world's cave.

        Parameters:

        time - current time
